Name: maximize_project_budget
Description: Maximize the total budget across all selected projects.

Name: maximize_project_priority
Description: Maximize the priority of selected projects.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed by teams.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort for all tasks in a sprint.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the impact of blockers by focusing on high-severity ones first.

Name: maximize_user_story_priority
Description: Maximize the priority of user stories selected for a sprint.

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the priority of features planned for a release.

Name: maximize_story_points_in_sprint
Description: Maximize the total story points of user stories in a sprint.

Name: minimize_number_of_blockers
Description: Minimize the total number of active blockers.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Prioritize work relevant to stakeholders with high influence.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the satisfaction of the team at the end of a sprint.
